description:
When their parents are no longer in the picture, a brother decides that he is going to care for his younger sister. Soon enough his intentions turn sour and lewd thoughts enter his brain... he starts touching her at nighttime while he thinks she is sleeping, little does he know that she is only pretending to be asleep...
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: Imouto no Hada ni Fureta Hajimete no Yoru
La première nuit, je l’ai titillée pour essayer
The First Night When I Touched My Little Sister`s Bare Skin
妹の肌に触れた初めての夜
